Sandglass Iridium


A collection of 729 generative art pieces on the Avalanche blockchain.

Click on the hourglass to to connect your wallet and mint.
Click on images for more detailed information.

CONTROLS:

On Desktop

Use the mouse to look around

W key - Move Forward
A key - Move Left
D key - Move Right
S key - Move backwards


On Mobile

Swipe finger to look around

Use the left thumb on the virtual joystick to walk around
